kb3.name: kb3_sum_alliance
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_sum_alliance` ( `asm_all_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `asm_shp_id` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `asm_kill_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `asm_kill_isk` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `asm_loss_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `asm_loss_isk` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`asm_all_id`,`asm_shp_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
